title: Southern Hemisphere
src:
import csv

# Basic file i/o with csv library

print('Southern hemisphere countries:')

with open('avg-lat-long.csv', 'r') as csv_file:
    reader = csv.reader(csv_file, delimiter=',', quotechar='"')
    for row in reader:
        code, name, lat, long = row
        if float(lat) < 0:
            print(name)
